description: Shifts left under "EGJ" (unordered, element, labeled) transform.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
maple: with(combinat):b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(multinomial(n, i$j, n-i*j)*binomial(b((i-1)$2), j)       *b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> b((n-1)$2):seq(a(n), n=1..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 30 2013
author: _Christian G. Bower_
